summary: This is an email from a Paralegal Specialist in the Office of the Deputy Attorney General at the U.S. Department of Justice, dated November 18, 2020, transmitting an updated spreadsheet titled 'Survivor Briefing invitees_ODAG_Master_List_FINAL 11-18-2020.xlsx'. The email notes that the spreadsheet includes newly acquired email addresses from briefing RSVP questionnaires.

persons.name: Paralegal Specialist
persons.context: Sender of the email from the Office of the Deputy Attorney General at the U.S. Department of Justice, transmitting an updated survivor briefing invitee master list.

events.title: Transmission of Updated Survivor Master List
events.description: A Paralegal Specialist from the Office of the Deputy Attorney General sends an email with an attached, updated spreadsheet of survivor briefing invitees, incorporating new email addresses from RSVP questionnaires.

keyFacts: The Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG) at the U.S. Department of Justice was maintaining a 'Survivor Master List' as of November 2020.
The list was being updated with email addresses collected from RSVP questionnaires for a survivor briefing.
The document is internal DOJ correspondence, indicating an ongoing official process related to survivors of the Epstein case.
